headline: Does AEP’s $72 Billion Grid Partnership Signal New Growth Catalysts for Quanta Services (PWR)?
summary: On November 5, 2025, American Electric Power announced new long-term agreements with Quanta Services aimed at supporting a US$72 billion capital plan to deliver high-voltage transmission, expand domestic power equipment manufacturing, and strengthen the grid for growing markets such as data centers. This collaboration brings together AEP’s deep operational expertise and Quanta’s execution capabilities, increasing their access to large-scale grid projects and addressing critical supply chain...
